title: Worked Solution
text:
The correct answer is:

For people who struggle to put a narrative together, frameworks can help them structure their ideas.

Explanation:
Story frameworks serve as a tool to guide individuals in organizing their thoughts, especially when crafting narratives can be challenging. While frameworks offer helpful structures, they are not one-size-fits-all solutions, and success depends on context, creativity, and adaptation. It is not always practical or beneficial for every organization to use the same framework universally, as different scenarios may require different storytelling approaches.
